name: Dhrama Dojo Demake Remake
description:
A game I decided to make after being inspired by the Dhrama Dojo PuzzleScript Demake.

Clear symbols by filling the buffer with the same symbol!

Controls:

  • W and S to go up and down
  • A to push a symbol left
  • Shift + A to focus on a symbol
  • Space to push all of a row to, or all of a symbol, based on focus
  • Shift + Space to clear focus
